meanings.definition: A type of silk fabric made from irregular, rough yarns.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful doupioni dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The doupioni fabric had a unique texture and sheen.
meanings.sent3: The doupioni silk whispered as she moved, like a secret shared between friends.
meanings.sent4: Her doupioni scarf was a cascade of shimmering threads.
meanings.sent5: The doupioni material felt like a gentle breeze against her skin.

meanings.definition: A garment made from doupioni fabric.
meanings.sent1: He admired the elegant doupioni gown she wore to the event.
meanings.sent2: The doupioni outfit was the highlight of the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her doupioni dress was so fancy, it should have its own red carpet.
meanings.sent4: In her doupioni ensemble, she felt like a queen.
meanings.sent5: The doupioni attire shimmered under the lights, drawing all eyes to her.
